creator: phillip.wells@drkw.com
text:
defaults.properties contains the following mapping for this task:

junitreport=org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.junit.XMLResultAggregator

However the specified class does not exist in the optional.jar. This seems to 
be an error in the build process: this class was present in Ant 1.3b2.

creator: conor@apache.org
text: Fixed now. Please grab the optional jar again. Sorry.
